home.title: Covid-19 Testing | Home
bannerSubtitle: Book a test at your local health center.

prompts.registerSuccessInfo1: Click on Book An Appointment button to book one now or come back later.
prompts.registerSuccessInfo2: Your password will be required if you choose to book later.
prompts.registerErrorInfo1: Something went wrong with your registration. Please refresh and try again
prompts.bookSuccessInfo1: Please remember to follow social distancing rules when you come in for testing
prompts.bookSuccessInfo2: If unable to attend cancel immediately to allow others to use slots.
prompts.bookErrorInfo1: Something went wrong with your booking. Please refresh and try again
